ADVANCED_TARGET_SCANNER_DESCRIPTION.message: Long range target scanner with system wide coverage.

ATMOSPHERIC_SHIELDING_DESCRIPTION.message: Shields your spaceship from the heat of atmospheric re-entry.

ATMOSPHERIC_SHIELDING_HEAVY.description: Will withstand higher pressures than normal Atmospheric Shielding

ATMOSPHERIC_SHIELDING_HEAVY_DESCRIPTION.message: A more capable version of Atmospheric Shields

CARGO_LIFE_SUPPORT_DESCRIPTION.message: Allows the transport of live cargo.

CARGO_SCOOP_DESCRIPTION.message: Permits scooping cargo pods from space.

DAMAGE_PER_SHOT.description: Tooltip explaining weapon damage per shot

ECM_ADVANCED_DESCRIPTION.message: An electronic countermeasure missile defence system, capable of destroying more advanced types of homing missiles.

ECM_BASIC_DESCRIPTION.message: An electronic countermeasure missile defence system, capable of destroying some homing missiles.

EMPTY_SLOT.description: Text indicating an empty equipment slot.

FUEL_SCOOP_DESCRIPTION.message: Permits scooping hydrogen fuel from gas giant planets.

HULL_AUTOREPAIR_DESCRIPTION.message: Automatically repairs the ship's hull in the event of damage.

HYPERCLOUD_ANALYZER_DESCRIPTION.message: Analyze hyperspace clouds to determine destination and time of arrival or departure.

LASER_COOLING_BOOSTER_DESCRIPTION.message: An improved cooling system for your weapons.

MININGCANNON_17MW_DESCRIPTION.message: Used to blast-mine mineral rich asteroids.

MININGCANNON_5MW_DESCRIPTION.message: Used to blast-mine mineral rich asteroids.

MULTI_SCOOP.description: A ship equipment: a cargo scoop and fuel scoop combined into one

MULTI_SCOOP_DESCRIPTION.message: Although less effective than a fuel scoop it permits scooping of both cargo and fuel

ORBIT_SCANNER.description: A ship equipment that records data of terrain, for cartography mapping/geological survey. Note: Scout Mission module reference and distinguishes between 'orbital' and 'surface' scanner types, the former scans planet from orbit, the latter from low altitude.

ORBIT_SCANNER_DESCRIPTION.message: Scans planet from orbit, for scientific data

ORBIT_SCANNER_GOOD.description: A sensor used to scan planets from high altitude / orbit + model number (that's minimum km altitude)

ORBIT_SCANNER_GOOD_DESCRIPTION.message: Scans planet from orbit, for scientific data, with high resolution and wide aperture lens

RADAR_DESCRIPTION.message: Provides a 3D map of nearby ships.

SHIELD_ENERGY_BOOSTER_DESCRIPTION.message: Increases the rate at which shields recharge.

SHIELD_GENERATOR_DESCRIPTION.message: Provides additional hull defences with each unit fitted.

SHOTS_PER_MINUTE.description: Tooltip explaining weapon fire rate / RPM counter

SURFACE_SCANNER.description: A ship equipment that records data of terrain, for cartography mapping/geological survey. Note: Scout Mission module reference and distinguishes between 'orbital' and 'surface' scanner types, the former scans planet from orbit, the latter from low altitude. Model manufacturer name is meant to sound like a cheap brand.

SURFACE_SCANNER_DESCRIPTION.message: Cartography mapping and geological survey recorder

SURFACE_SCANNER_GOOD.description: A ship equipment that records data of terrain, for cartography mapping/geological survey. Note: Scout Mission module reference and distinguishes between 'orbital' and 'surface' scanner types. Model manufacturer name is meant to be associated with high quality.

SURFACE_SCANNER_GOOD_DESCRIPTION.message: High resolution cartography mapping and geological survey recorder

TARGET_SCANNER_DESCRIPTION.message: Used to remotely inspect the equipment, cargo and state of other ships.

THRUSTERS_BASIC_DESCRIPTION.message: A modified type of thrusters approved for your ship.

THRUSTERS_BEST_DESCRIPTION.message: Custom made thrusters that provide the best possible output.

THRUSTERS_MEDIUM_DESCRIPTION.message: Thrusters that have been optimised to reduce inefficiencies and improve power output.

TOTAL_MODULE_CAPACITY.description: Tooltip explaining module capacity of specific slot

TOTAL_MODULE_WEIGHT.description: Tooltip explaining total equipped weight of specific slot

TRADE_COMPUTER.description: Ship equipment computing profitable commodities to trade between two systems

TRADE_COMPUTER_DESCRIPTION.message: Shows profitable commodities to trade between selected and current system

UNOCCUPIED_CABIN_DESCRIPTION.message: Required for transport of a single passenger
